document_notes.text:
This update for librelp fixes the following issues:
  CVE-2018-1000140 (bsc#1086730):
  librelp contained a stack-based buffer overflow in the checking of x509 certificates.
  A remote attacker with an access to the rsyslog logging facility could have exploited
  it by sending a specially crafted x509 certificate.

notes.text: rsyslog librelp version 1.2.14 and earlier contains a Buffer Overflow vulnerability in the checking of x509 certificates from a peer that can result in Remote code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable a remote attacker that can connect to rsyslog and trigger a stack buffer overflow by sending a specially crafted x509 certificate.
